oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: When I Get Rich - Red Sovine performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of When I Get Rich, written by Tommy Coley and Happy Wilson, and performed by Red Sovine. Performance of Away Out On The Mountain, written by Jimmie Rodgers, and performed by Lew Childre.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Sovine; Lew Childre
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Red Sovine performs "When I Get Rich" [incomplete] / (0:50) Lew Childre performs "Away Out On The Mountain" [incomplete] / (2:00) Lew Childre [unconfirmed] announces an Aunt Jemima Cornbread advertisement [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wilson, Happy, 1919-1977; Sovine, Red; Rodgers, Jimmie, 1897-1933; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961
